channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Boy wounded in Minnesota church shooting asks doctor: ‘Can you say a prayer with me?’
item.description: Stories of bravery and heartache are emerging after the deadly shooting at a Minneapolis Catholic church during a Mass celebrating the start of the school year.

item.title: Trump taps federal agents to tackle local policing. That’s not always helpful, critics say
Montana man who evaded authorities for a week after bar shooting faces four counts of murder
